alert.note: Alert for Boulder; Larimer; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 11:34PM MDT until May 10 at 12:15AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM MDT FOR WEST CENTRAL WELD...SOUTHEASTERN LARIMER AND NORTHEASTERN BOULDER COUNTIES... At 1133 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Berthoud, or 16 miles southwest of Greeley, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Johnstown, Milliken, Loveland, Windsor and southern Fort Collins. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
